metadata.title: CVE-2023-1733 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service condition exists in the Prometheus server bundled withGitLab affecting all versions from 11.10 to 15.8.5, 15.9 to 15.9.4 and15.10 to 15.10.1.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
